text: Kiamari Railway Station (, Sindhi: ڪياماڙي ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Kiamari Town, Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan.Kiamari Town - Government of Karachi ۔ ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Karachi Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Kiamari railway station
